Source.Name: fluidsynth
Source.Summary: A real-time software synthesizer based on the SoundFont 2 specifications.
Source.Description: A real-time software synthesizer based on the SoundFont 2 specifications. It can be used for live audio synthesis of MIDI events or for rendering MIDI files to disk, using SoundFont instruments. It can also be embedded in other applications.

Package.Name: fluidsynth
